content.eamr: ( ing-0 "3 cups cooked, mashed winter squash" )

content.text: 2 tablespoons butter or trans fat-free margarine
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "2 tablespoons butter or trans fat-free margarine" )
( ing-5 "1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper to taste" )
( ing-6 "3 tablespoons sweetened coconut flakes, toasted (optional)" )

content.text: 0) In a medium bowl, combine first six ingredients.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@21:28 / AC
		:ppt ( "first six ingredients"@29:50 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-0 )
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
			:ref ( ing-3 )
			:ref ( ing-4 )
			:ref ( ing-5 )
		)
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a medium bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Microwave on high until heated through, about 5 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Microwave"@3:12 / AC
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "high"@16:20 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until heated through"@21:41 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "5 minutes"@49:58 / DUR )
	)
)
